name: Bouncing Bush (Ourf)
description:
Play in web on itch.io

Download only at https://bb.ourfgames.com/

In Bouncing Bush, you play as a bush called Bushly that must navigate a treacherous world filled with obstacles and enemies. Armed with nothing but your bouncy nature, you must jump your way through the various levels to complete your mission of finding Lord Crystal and stopping his plans to turn the world to evil. 

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter various challenges that will test your skills and reflexes. You'll need to bounce past enemies, leap across platforms and avoid the obstacles that face your way. 

To aid you on your journey, you can collect items that will give you special abilities. For example, you can collect a sticky honey trap that will stick enemies to the ground, or a magnet power-up that will make all of the coins fly to you. 

In addition to the main story mode, Bouncing Bush also features a variety of different game modes. For example, there's an endless world gamemode where there is no flag, but just coins and monsters and there is a calm and peaceful parkour gamemode for people who just enjoy jumping across platforms with calm music and no monsters. 

With its colourful graphics, upbeat music, and addictive gameplay, Bouncing Bush is a platformer game that will keep you entertained for hours on end. So what are you waiting for? Get ready to bounce your way to victory!
